userid: SELECT Id FROM Users WHERE Name =
accessrights: SELECT UserAccess.UserId,Menu.Name,UserAccess.R, UserAccess.W, UserAccess.E, UserAccess.D FROM UserAccess JOIN Menu ON UserAccess.MenuItemId = Menu.Id WHERE UserId =
update: UPDATE UserAccess SET R=@R,W=@W,E=@E,D=@D WHERE UserId=@UserId AND MenuItemId=@MenuItemId;
